name: Abdul-Mussawir Amani
story: Abdullah Karizi grew up in a small village in Afghanistan. He joined the military at a young age and quickly rose through the ranks. He is highly respected by his peers for his tactical skills and ability to lead his squad. Despite being away from his family for long periods of time, Abdullah is committed to his duties and takes pride in serving his country. He has three children whom he loves dearly, and his ultimate goal is to create a better future for them.
